mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Low-cost web hosting provider with excellent pricing and good feature selection. Offered similar services to GoDaddy at lower price points.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Best value for money with pricing starting at $1.00/month for shared hosting. Excellent pricing with good feature selection and performance. Much cheaper than GoDaddy's $5.99/month starting price.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Best overall GoDaddy alternative, identical in many ways with appointment booking, business email, and blogging tools. Pricing starts at $1.00/month vs GoDaddy's $5.99/month. Excellent value with good performance in tests.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Cheapest and most well-known hosting provider. Excellent pricing starting at $1.00/month for shared hosting with good features and performance. Identical to GoDaddy in appointment booking, business email, and blogging tools but at fraction of the price.
